subject: [Radiance-general] Mailing List Problems - Test messag
body:
Sorry everyone.  There was a problem with the mailing list and restarting
it seems to have sent out old messages.  Looks like it's stopped now.

If this message makes it through, everything should be back to normal.

Andy
